pages.text: $(li)Turtles are common passive animals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/beach)Beaches$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/seagrass)Seagrass$(/l) on death.$(br)$(li)They can be breed giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/seagrass)Seagrass$(/l), then, this animal dig in a nearby sand block which to lay its eggs.
When the baby turtle borns from the turtle egg, it may drops a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/scute)Scute$(/l).
